alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 08 at 1:37PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CENTRAL COLORADO RIVER BASIN...FLAT TOPS...AND GORE AND ELK MOUNTAINS HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 136 PM MST, a band of heavy snow was near Glenwood Springs moving east at 15 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED... This band of heavy snow will remain over mainly rural areas of central Central Colorado River Basin, southern Flat Tops and northwestern Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys Counties. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 119 and 140. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys
